original_text: Then have the trumpet sounded everywhere on the tenth day of the seventh month; on the Day of Atonement sound the trumpet throughout your land.
korean_text: 일곱째 달 열흘날은 속죄일이니 너는 뿔나팔 소리를 내되 전국에서 뿔나팔을 크게 불지며

sentences.original_text: Then have the trumpet sounded everywhere
on the tenth day of the seventh month
sound the trumpet throughout your land
